tool_description: The Harmonized System (HS) code is a standardized numerical method to classify export trade products by customs authorities around the world.  Visit : https://sell.amazon.in/grow-your-business/amazon-global-selling/blogs/harmonized-system-hs-code
title: Amazon Global Selling

api_list.name: Amazon
api_list.description: The Harmonized System (HS) code is a standardized numerical method to classify export trade products by customs authorities around the world.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://amazon-global-selling.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "amazon-global-selling.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
